sentences.en: A life of dullness , of drab, unvarying monotony.
sentences.cn: 平凡的, 永远是如此平凡的.

sentences.en: At the drab wooden house in which she lived he said good night briefly and amiably.
sentences.cn: 到了她住的那幢黄褐色的木头房子前,他简短而友好地道了晚安.

sentences.en: Flowers added a note of cheerfulness to the drab room.
sentences.cn: 鲜花给单调沉闷的房间增添了一丝愉快的气氛.

sentences.en: I knew it all, the whole drab compass of marital disillusion.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地知道婚姻幻灭的单调乏味的境界.

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages the term "drab" denoted a very simple type of woollen cloth which was used by peasants to make their clothes.
sentences.cn: 中世纪时，drab（“本色布”）一词指的是一种农民用来制衣的非常普通的羊毛织物。

sentences.en: Life was now drab compared with the more exciting life style overseas.
sentences.cn: 比起海外那种更富有刺激的生活方式来,现在的生活显得了无生气.

sentences.en: Mary was wearing the same drab grey dress.
sentences.cn: 玛丽穿着同一件毫无朝气的灰色裙子。

sentences.en: On the whole, the campaign was a drab affair.
sentences.cn: 总的来说, 这次选举单调乏味.

sentences.en: people forced to live grey, drab existences in ugly towns
sentences.cn: 被迫在丑陋的城市里过着平淡乏味生活的人

sentences.en: The city, drab and dour by day, is transformed at night.
sentences.cn: 这座城市白天死气沉沉、单调乏味，晚上就完全变了样。

sentences.en: The rest of the day's activities often seemed drab or depressing.
sentences.cn: 一天的剩余时光好像常常是乏味或令人沮丧的。

sentences.en: The rest of the day'sactivities often seemed drab or depressing.
sentences.cn: 一天的剩余时光好像常常是乏味或令人沮丧的。

sentences.en: The train moved slowly south through flat, drab main - line scenery.
sentences.cn: 火车穿过干线两侧风景单调乏味的地区, 缓慢地向南驶去.

sentences.en: The walls were painted a drab green.
What do you find to attract you in this poor drab little country?
sentences.cn: 这个单调破败的小天地还有什么吸引你们的地方 吗 ?

sentences.en: Within Cuba life had settled into a drab routine.
sentences.cn: 在古巴国内,生活已变成一套干巴巴的公式.

words.tran_cn: 浅褐色；无生气；邋遢；小额

trans.tran_cn: 浅褐色；无生气；邋遢；小额
